title: Axel Pressbutton (Eclipse fill)
description:
The ECUP quietly slips in through the backdoor and masturbates on your drapery, with 'Axel Pressbutton'!

Published by Eclipse in 1984-85, 'Axel Pressbutton' was about a violent cyborg with the face of Ernest Borgnine and a button on his chest which, when pushed, delivers orgasmic pleasure. Yeah. I said it.

The series ran for six issues and was comprised of British reprints, featuring early work from Steve Moore, aka "Pedro Henry", Steve Dillon, Dave Gibbons and Brian Bolland. A later series entitled "Laser Eraser and Pressbutton" - previously uploaded - continued the adventures.

A great deal of love to the creators and scanners! Please do get it, please do seed it!
